EmailTemplate.name: Speedo Wholesale Auto-response
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting Speedo USA Customer Service Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for contacting Speedo Customer Service.
This is automated note to let you know that we have received your request ({!Case.CaseNumber}).
A personal response from our customer service specialists will follow shortly. Please be patient as all emails are handled in the order in which they are received.
